nodes.title: ğŸ“ è§†é¢‘ç”Ÿæˆæç¤ºè¯
widgets_values: Hyper-fast action sequence. Handheld shaky camera follows two realistic samurais fighting in a burning feudal Japanese village under heavy rain, mud and ashes flying with every movement. One samurai wields a katana surrounded by a flowing blue energy aura resembling moving water, liquid streaks trailing each slash, while the other channels a red fiery energy wrapping his blade with sparks and heat distortion. The camera circles aggressively with whip pans, sudden angle shifts and close tracking shots as their swords collide, releasing powerful VFX bursts of energy, glowing particles, shockwaves and splashes of rain and mud in brief slow motion. Fire, smoke and supernatural energies blend with cinematic realistic lighting, creating an intense, chaotic and visceral battle
